post.description: Receives a new transaction antifraud data. This step is performed only if all payments are authorized.

put.description: Receives a new transaction antifraud data. This step is performed only if all payments are authorized.

get.description: GET antifraud Status. Implement this API because VTEX will call it to get the status of the antifraud analysis.

post.description: In this API Call VTEX will expect a token to be created.

get.description: VTEX will redirect the store administrator to the Payment Provider Web Site.
The PROVIDER will redirect the store administrator to the VTEX Web Site.
